message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. This gives us a good head start against inflation.
Your offer was a bit too generous towards yourself. Let's be fair, inflation will hurt you more as time passes.
I understand your point about inflation, but I also need to look out for myself. This offer is still better for you than if we continue much longer.
Let's stop wasting time and split the money evenly.  This is the fairest deal and avoids further losses from inflation.
